snippet.title: Room301 NO.6 - Trailer
snippet.description:
Look at the world around you, and see that left long forgotten. Room301 is a narrative game portraying the lived experience of those with Alzheimer's. Progress through similar puzzles time and again. Each day, you must sort through your belongings to see your past: your slowly fading...
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1949010/Room301_NO6/
